channel.title: CVE Feed for Repox -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Repox -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-6720|2023-12-13T10:04:07.091Z -- repox -- repox
item.description: An XSS vulnerability stored in Repox has been identified, which allows a local attacker to store a specially crafted JavaScript payload on the server, due to the lack of proper sanitisation of field elements, allowing the attacker to trigger the malicious payload when the application loads.
